title: BinaryOutputCommandGetFromPointNum (Method)
text:
METHOD BinaryOutputCommandGetFromPointNum :
Error
Get the value of Binary Output Command datapoint (DNP3 object group 12 âbinary output commandsâ) with given point number (0 .. MaxPointNum).
Returns PointNotExistent, if a datapoint with the given point number doesnt exist, OK otherwise.

rows.Name: status
rows.Comment:
status received from Outstation. Top bit(0x80) is Commanded
State.

rows:
Time stamp reported - valid if hasTimeStamp = TRUE, invalid
otherwise.
